about.title: About Me
text: I am an enthusiastic and highly motivated undergraduate student majoring in Computer Information Systems at Arizona State University. I firmly believe that technology can solve major problems that humankind is facing today and I am keen on making a difference solving them.
At the moment, I'm looking for a summer 2020 internship.
